co.cask.cdap.api.workflow
Interface WorkflowConfigurer

public interface WorkflowConfigurer

Configurer for configuring the Workflow.

Method Summary
 void addAction(WorkflowAction action)
          Adds a custom action as a next sequential step in the Workflow
 void addMapReduce(String mapReduce)
          Adds a MapReduce program as a next sequential step in the Workflow.
 void addSpark(String spark)
          Adds a Spark program as a next sequential step in the Workflow.
 void setDescription(String description)
          Sets the description of the Workflow
 void setName(String name)
          Sets the name of the Workflow
 void setProperties(Map<String,String> properties)
          Sets the map of properties that will be available through the WorkflowSpecification.getProperties() at runtime
 

Method Detail

setName

void setName(String name)
Sets the name of the Workflow

Parameters:
name - of the Workflow

setDescription

void setDescription(String description)
Sets the description of the Workflow

Parameters:
description - of the Workflow

setProperties

void setProperties(Map<String,String> properties)
Sets the map of properties that will be available through the WorkflowSpecification.getProperties() at runtime

Parameters:
properties - the properties to set

addMapReduce

void addMapReduce(String mapReduce)
Adds a MapReduce program as a next sequential step in the Workflow. MapReduce program must be configured when the Application is defined. Application deployment will fail if the MapReduce program does not exist.

Parameters:
mapReduce - name of the MapReduce program to be added to the Workflow

addSpark

void addSpark(String spark)
Adds a Spark program as a next sequential step in the Workflow. Spark program must be configured when the Application is defined. Application deployment will fail if the Spark program does not exist.

Parameters:
spark - name of the Spark program to be added to the Workflow

addAction

void addAction(WorkflowAction action)
Adds a custom action as a next sequential step in the Workflow

Parameters:
action - to be added to the Workflow
